description: The Asociaci√≥n Agropecuaria Ambiental del Sur del Tolima is a second-level association formed by five coffee-growing organizations in the Chaparral area, which has historically faced neglect and conflict. Established in 2015 to access a Canadian project, it now supports 256 producers, including 54 women, and promotes sustainable practices. The association focuses on improving marketing, financial sustainability, and environmental practices while exporting coffee to Germany, the USA, and Canada, aiming to enhance its business model and capacities.
name: Unichaparral
